message.content: {"id": "50059", "title": "Bug 50059: Resources not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources if metadatacomplete=\"true\" set in web.xml", "description": "Bug 50059: Resources are not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources if metadatacomplete=\"true\" is set in web.xml. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a Servlet 3.0 web app called \"foo\". 2. Set the metadatacomplete=\"true\" attribute on the webapp element in the /WEBINF/web.xml file.", "OB": "The jar containing the resources should be placed in /WEBINF/lib. Let's name the jar file \"bar.jar\".", "EB": "The jar file \"bar.jar\" should be placed in the /WEBINF/lib directory.", "SR": "Make sure that the resources inside \"bar.jar\" are served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources even when metadatacomplete=\"true\" is set in web.xml."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'The jar should be placed in /WEBINF/lib (lets name it bar.jar).3. ', 'SR': ''}
